History
=======

0.1.0 (2019-06-18)
------------------

* Cookie-cutted.

0.9.0 (2020-09-25)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.

1.0.0 (2020-12-10)
------------------

* Stable API.

1.1.0 (2020-12-10)
------------------

* Beta Release.

1.1.1 (2020-12-10)
------------------

* Basic Readme doc.

1.2.2 (2020-12-14)
------------------

* Configset path fix.
* Static assets moved.

2.0.0 (2021-09-09)
------------------

* SpaCy upgraded to 3.1.2.
* Batch multiprocess processing for better throughput

2.0.1 (2021-09-09)
------------------

* Fixed bulk operator
